Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/74th Street
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 79th, Racine, 71st and Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/74th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 79th, Racine, 71st, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/74th Street.

Allow extra travel time.
